name: Magic Cookie Bars from EAGLE BRAND®
author: Eagle brand
summary: This bar cookie is an old fashioned favorite. Chocolate chips, nuts and coconut are set in a caramelized layer on top of a graham cracker crust.
ingredients: ½ cup butter or margarine, melted
1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk
directions: Heat oven to 350 degrees F (325 degrees for glass dish)
Coat 13x9-inch baking pan with no-stick cooking spray
Combine graham cracker crumbs and butter
Press into bottom of prepared pan
Pour sweetened condensed milk evenly over crumb mixture
Layer evenly with chocolate chips, coconut and nuts
Press down firmly with a fork
Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned
